entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
